Detailed Description

Filtering window function.

This class holds information about filtering window function and can prepare the filtering window.

Known filters: Filter::Ftype

If you want to add a new filter:

  1. Add your filter into the Filter::Ftype enumeration.
  2. Add your filter to the Filter::Filter(const std::string &, float) constructor
  3. Add your filter to the Filter::name() function.
  4. Add your filter to the Filter::fill() function: additional "case" in the switch-case construction
  5. Add your filter to the Filter::includeFilterTable() option table
  6. If your new filter requires additional parameter(s) then you can add them using the Filter::alsig as the example.

Member Function Documentation

Line & Filter::fill ( Line &  filt,
int  pixels = 0 
) const

Fills the window.

Prepares the window function.

Fills the line with the filter function. If pixels is 0 then reads the the width of the window from the line length.Otherwise resizes the line.

Parameters:
filtLine to store the window.
pixelsDesired size of the window.
Returns:
Filled window.
